contact.presentation: Lead developer, curious by nature and passionate about his profession.

summary.content:
I have {{ value }} years of experience as a designer developer in information systems.

Mainly specialized in backend technologies (Java, Spring...), which I was able to experience on different missions themselves touching on several fields of activity (space, human resources, communities...).

Nevertheless, I have a fullstack profile thanks to the many frontend projects that I have been able to carry out in parallel.

I am used to working with the Agile methods that I like when it comes to managing a project (Scrum, Kanban..).

content.dev: Development related to all types of languages and technologies
content.homelab: Build and maintain a homelab dedicated to software development
content.running: Running (participation in the Toulouse marathon as a team)
content.movie: Horror films of the 80s-90s (Carpenter, Cronenberg, Romero...)
